name: BurgeonNest 45"x32" Extra Large Cat Litter Mat, Honeycomb Double Layer Kitty Litter Trapping Mat, Urine Proof & Waterproof, Easy Clean, Machine Washable, Non-Slip, Scatter Control-Grey
short_description: Large Cat Litter Mat: The 45" x 32" cat litter mat is suitable for multi-cat households. One litter mat is large enough to accommodate 2-3 litter boxes

Honeycomb Double-Layer Design: The double-layer design make litter gathering much easier. Just pick up the litter mat and pour the litter into the litter box for recycling. Honeycomb hole is suitable for various types of cat litter

Waterproof, Urineproof, Non-slip: The bottom layer is made of absorbent, leakproof material to keep cat urine from seeping into your hardwood floors and carpets. With a non-slip bottom, your kitty will not slide when jumping out of the litter box

Easy to Clean: Removable design, makes cleanup a lot easier. The upper layer can be washed directly with the shower head, and the bottom layer is machine washable, freeing your hands, avoiding contact with urine and litter, saving time and energy

Comfortable and Soft: Better durability, soft EVA material is gentle for sensitive cat paws, your kitty will enjoy scratching on the mat. Note: To allow creases to soften, lay flat for at least 24 hours and place weight such as litter box on the mat

name: Cat Litter Mat, 24x18 Inches Large Double Layer Honeycomb Cat Litter Trapping Mat, Non Slip Waterproof Urine Proof Cat Litter Box Mat for Floor, Kitty Litter Rug, Cat Supplies, Pink
short_description: Premium Pink Cat Litter Mat: A large 24x18 inch cat mat for litter box that catches every stray piece of litter—from your cat’s paws or spilled from the litter box. Place it in front of or underneath the box—it’s up to you. Keep your home clean. No need for daily sweeping, no lingering odors—just a cleaner, fresher home and more free time for you.

Double-Layer Honeycomb Structure: The top layer features holes that capture all kinds of litter, allowing it to fall through to the waterproof bottom layer for easy cleanup. Simply pick up the kitty litter mat, pour the trapped litter back into the box, and reuse it—mess-free and effortless. This clever design minimizes litter waste and streamlines your daily cleaning routine.

Washable & Easy to Clean: The anti tracking cat litter mat is designed to prevent litter from getting stuck, unlike traditional mats. Cleaning is simple—just rinse it under a sink or shower to wash away dirt with ease. For even faster cleanup, any leftover litter can be quickly removed with a vacuum.

Durable Materials: Crafted from high-quality, extra-thick EVA material (0.35 inch), this cat litter catcher mat combines both softness and durability to keep your cat comfortable. It is scratch- and bite-resistant, ensuring long-lasting use. Free from harmful substances, it provides a safe and comfortable space for your cat every time they visit the litter box.

Non-Slip & Urine-Proof: The fully enclosed bottom layer and tight sealing of the cat litter pad prevent any liquid from leaking, keeping your floors dry and protected. The non-slip backing ensures the mat stays firmly in place, even during your cat’s playful or active movements.

name: Cat Litter Mat - 23.2'' x 14.6'' Small Litter Trapping Mat, Easy to Clean Litter Box Mat, Waterproof, Urine-Proof, Non-Slip Kitty Litter Mats for Floor, Grey
short_description: DOUBLE-LAYER LITTER CATCHER: With a honeycomb hollow layer and leakproof bottom layer, Powools double-layer kitty litter mat can effectively trap loose litter from the box and cat paws. Moreover, the side-opening design allows you to tip the mat and pour the collected litter into the litter box, easily recycling it and reducing waste.

PREMIUM EVA MATERIAL: Powools cat mat for litter is made of high-quality EVA material that is ultra-soft, odor-free, non-toxic, and resistant to cat scratches. Furthermore, the soft touch is gentle for sensitive cat paws, making the mat ideal for stepping on and resting. Rest assured that your cats will love walking on it without irritation.

WATERPROOF LITTER MAT: Powools litter mat for litter box features a waterproof bottom layer, preventing urine and other liquids from seeping down to the floor. It helps protect the hardwood floor and carpets from damage and stubborn stains. The anti-slip backing keeps the mat in place without moving while in use.

WASHABLE & EASY TO CLEAN: Powools cat litter trap mat makes cleaning a breeze, saving time and effort. There is no need to clean the cat litter on the floor frequently every day. Just dump the collected cat litter into the litter box or trash can every 2-3 days. For stubborn stains, you can wipe the mat with a damp cloth or rinse it with a sprinkler.

MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS: Powools litter catcher mat is large enough to cover the entrance area of most litter boxes. This versatile mat is not only a cat litter mat, but also a feeding mat that can be used under the food and water bowls to catch spills and crumbs. Powools cat mat is a must-have for any cat owner to keep the cat paws and floors clean.
